thread.title: You Can Now Get Married At Taco Bell For $600–Taco Bell Love And Tacos Contest
thread.title_full: You Can Now Get Married At Taco Bell For $600–Taco Bell Love And Tacos Contest

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: You Can Now Get Married At Taco Bell For $600–Taco Bell Love And Tacos Contest
text:
For fast-food lovers, there's something inherently romantic about Taco Bell — nothing says "I love you" like a bouquet of Cheesy Fiesta Potatoes.
For #Valentines , I made my GF a bouquet of @tacobell Cheesy Fiesta Potatoes pic.twitter.com/uPLvli203Z
— Arbor Day is Apr 28 (@KevinNelson84) February 14, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But now you can actually get married at Taco Bell thanks to a new contest. From Valentine's Day until March 1, couples can enter the Love and Tacos Contest for a chance to win an all-expenses paid trip to Las Vegas to get hitched at the brand-new flagship Taco Bell Cantina .
All you have to do is post a short video or photo that describes how Taco Bell fits into your love story, and then share it on Twitter or Instagram with the hashtag #LoveandTacosContest to qualify.
Thank goodness he loves Taco Bell as much as I do. This special Taco Bell in Chicago serves booze so a perfect date night for us has become...12 pack hard tacos, 2 margaritas, 3 handfuls of various sauce packets. Did I mention I love this man? #chicago #tacobell #tacos #12pack #margaritas #love #taconight #datenight #chicagofood #booze #loveandtacos #loveandtacoscontest @tacobell
A post shared by Charlie and Nav (@bigheartsbiggerstomachs) on Jul 20, 2016 at 10:29pm PDT
The good news is that even if you don't win, anyone can get married at the Taco Bell starting this summer. For $600, the couple can be wed in a ceremony inside the restaurant's chapel (LOL, so Vegas), and munch on a Taco 12 Pack — which is filled with tacos and a Cinnabon Delights cake — in a private reception area fit for 15 guests. The package also comes with some cute merchandise, like a sauce packet garter, bow-tie, and bouquet, as well as matching "Just Married" T-shirts for the bride and groom.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
So if you're looking for something fun, low-key, and spicy , this might be just the thing!
